author: salozmen29

text:
Mind = blown.  I remember being obsessed with this game after I rented it from the local Albertson's (Yeah, I'm THAT old).  What made it worse is that it was always rented out whenever I went back to find it again.

It was many agonizing months before I received this for my birthday.

author: Hobo Video

text: This game was very difficult but had the classic Capcom platformer graphics and music. While in the original japanese version the main character isn't anyone special, in the american version they decided he was Ken, which makes a lot of sense since that's definitely how he looks with his sunglasses and blue suit. The cover also faithfully shows what it's like to live in our time, they definitely had it right back then.
author: SupraDarky
